com.mpos.lottery.te.gamespec.sale.support.validator

接口 SelectedNumberValidator

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractSelectedNumberValidator, BankerSelectedNumberValidator, DigitalOddEvenSelectedNumberValidator, DigitalSumSelectedNumberValidator, DigitalXDSelectedNumberValidator, LfnNmodeSelectedNumberValidator, LfnPmodeSelectedNumberValidator, Magic100SingleSelectedNumberValidator, MultipleSelectedNumberValidator, RaffleSingleSelectedNumberValidator, RollSelectedNumberValidator, SingleSelectedNumberValidator, UnionMultipleSelectedNumberValidator

    public interface SelectedNumberValidator

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.math.BigDecimal calEntryAmount(BaseEntry entry)
      Calculate the entry amount.
      long calTotalBets(BaseEntry entry)

      void validate(Context respCtx, BaseTicket ticket, Game game, BaseEntry entry)

    • 方法详细资料

      • validate

        void validate(Context respCtx,
            BaseTicket ticket,
            Game game,
            BaseEntry entry)
              throws ApplicationException
        Validate the format of selected number:
        • The number can not be duplicated.
        • The minimal number can not be less than 1
        • The maximal number can not bet greater than N.
        • The verification associates to specified bet option
        Other constraints will be checked in concrete implementation class.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • calTotalBets

        long calTotalBets(BaseEntry entry)
                  throws ApplicationException
        Get the total bets of a selected number.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • calEntryAmount

        java.math.BigDecimal calEntryAmount(BaseEntry entry)
                                    throws ApplicationException
        Calculate the entry amount.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
